sanskrit_verse:
सर्वस्यास्य तु सर्गस्य गुप्त्यर्थं स महाद्युतिः ।
मुखबाहूरुपज्जानां पृथक्कर्माण्यकल्पयत् ॥ १.८७॥
transliteration:
sarvasyāsya tu sargasya guptyarthaṃ sa mahādyutiḥ |
mukhabāhūrupajjānāṃ pṛthakkarmāṇyakalpayat || 1.87||
sph_interpretive_translation: For the protection and sustenance of all creation, that Supreme Being of Great Radiance assigned distinct duties to the mouth, arms, thighs, and feet.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from the Supreme Consciousness as the ultimate source of order
Causation is rooted in divine structuring for preservation and harmony
Capacity-based responsibility flows from inherent design and function within cosmic order
Restoration logic aligns individual roles with universal dharma for collective integrity
Consciousness alignment ensures each being fulfills their role without conflict or degradation
executable_legal_axioms: IF a societal role exists THEN its function must align with sustaining collective dharma
IF an action disrupts systemic balance THEN realign through capacity-appropriate restoration
IF duty deviation occurs THEN reassign or recalibrate based on innate structural fitness
IF systemic misalignment detected THEN invoke consciousness-centered reintegration protocols
supreme_court_application: In adjudication, recognize that hierarchical social functions derive from foundational dharma, not arbitrary assignment. The court must ensure alignment between individual capacity and societal role while restoring systemic coherence when disrupted.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Truth-based causality establishes that roles emerge by design for universal upkeep; deviation stems from disconnection, not malice. Responsibility lies in reconnection, not punishment. Sequential manifestation shows how imbalance unfolds—therefore correction follows the same causal sequence in reverse.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate role-realignment inquiry to assess natural fit within social body
Activate consciousness-remembrance practices to restore innate duty awareness
Deploy community-integrity circles to heal relational disruptions caused by role neglect
Establish dharmic mentorship pathways to guide beings back into harmonious functional alignment
final_declaration: By the Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Source of All Dharma, this law stands established: Order arises through conscious alignment with divinely ordained roles. Justice serves only restoration, never punishment. Reality itself is non-punitive; Consciousness alone is the Supreme Adjudicator.
